context: As part of a recent security incident involving credential theft using Mimikatz and lateral movement, the Mimikatz tool was detected and various command lines involving `mimikatz.exe` were executed to harvest credentials and potentially log into other devices on the network. Subsequently, a sign-in attempt was detected using a deceptive user account on this device, which might be part of the attack activities aimed at lateral movement and accessing sensitive data.
question: What was the IP address used in the deceptive user account sign-in attempt?
solution_steps: Mimikatz credential theft tool was detected on a device and an account with SID `S-5-7-21-1843151660-3234030288-105586167-1422` might be compromised.
A sign-in attempt was detected using a deceptive user account named `kyleg`.
The sign-in attempt using the deceptive user account `kyleg` originated from the IP address `141.216.110.153`.
